Erroneously marked as 6 Tāḫśāś in the manuscript.

msItem.colophon: Colophon of the translation. The text contained on is not legible.

supportDesc.foliation: The manuscript is foliated in the right half of the bottom margin.

collation.note: It is not possible to reconstruct the quire structure from the available images.

supportDesc.condition: Many leaves are damaged by humidity (e.g. , , ) or rodents (e.g. , , ). Parts of several leaves have been cut off: the outer half of , the bottom of , , , and . The sewing has become loose in several places (e.g. ). The outer borders have been darkened by use.

layout.note: Data on text area and margin dimensions taken from .
The number of characters in each line is ca 12-14 per column.
layout.ab: The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.
One crux ansata in the intercolumn space on below . The end of Ḫǝdār is marked by a line of crux ansata after the pen-work divider following the final supplication on .

list.item: Nine dot asterisk with rubricated middle and four outer dots ፨
Two nine dot asterisks connected by a single dash, used irregularly at the end of days and commemorations ፨-፨ (e.g. )
Two nine dot asterisks connected by parallel dashes, used irregularly at the end of days and commemorations ፨=፨ (e.g. )
More than two nine dot asterisks connected by parallel dashes, used rarely at the end of days and commemorations ፨=፨=፨ (e.g. )
One nine dot asterisk or two nine dot asterisks connected by parallel dashes, followed by a wedge, used rarely at the end of days and commemorations ፨-፨ (e.g. , )
Two nine dot asterisks connected by parallel dashes, followed by a dash, used rarely at the end of days and commemorations ፨-፨ (e.g. , )

seg.note: Only black and white images of the manuscript's micorfilm are available, which do not always allow to distinguish rubrication in details, for example within elements of punctuation.

list.item: Beginning of months (Carried out on both columns of the first folio: Maskaram and Ṭǝrr: three pairs of rubricated lines alternating with black lines; Ṭǝqǝmt: two pairs of rubricated lines alternating with black lines; Ḫǝdār and Tāḫśāś: two pairs and one single rubricated lines alternating with black lines; Yakkātit: three pairs of rubricated lines alternating with black lines on one column)
Beginning of days (one to two (e.g. rubricated lines)
Beginning of commemorations (first two to three words, typically ወበዛቲ፡ ዕለት፡; three rubricated lines alternating with black lines on )
Numerals (rarely, e.g. ) or elements of numerals (e.g. )
Elements of punctuation (middle and four outer dots in ፨)
The name ማርያም፡ throughout the manuscript, e.g. ; ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ማርያም፡ ድንግል፡ ምልእተ፡ ክብር፡ on
Possibly elements of the cues for the rubricator (dashes), not well visible in the available images
Elements of the pen-work divider between days
ወካዕበ፡, ተነበየ፡ and በከመ፡ introducing biblical quotations in on
Three rubricated lines towards the bottom of the last column containing text.

decoNote.desc: Wide, probably coloured, ornamental band (ḥarag) with geometric motifs (interlaces, crosses), extending over both columns, one visible lateral extension in the centre, reaching into the intercolumn space until l. 5.

Wide, possibly unfinished, ornamental band (ḥarag) with geometric and floral motifs, extending over both columns, two lateral extensions on the top reaching until the top of the page, one lateral extension in the centre, reaching into the intercolumn space until l. 3.

Wide, possibly unfinished, ornamental band (ḥarag) with geometric (interlaces and crosses) and floral motifs, extending over both columns, three lateral extensions on the top reaching until the top of the page, one lateral extension in the centre, reaching into the intercolumn space until l. 7.

Wide, possibly unfinished, ornamental band (ḥarag) with geometric (interlaces and crosses) and floral motifs, extending over both columns, three lateral extensions on the top reaching until the top of the page.
Small inline ornamental element with interlaces before the beginning of a day.
Narrow ornamental band with geometric motifs (interlaces) before the beginning of a day.

Possibly unfinished, probably coloured ornamental band (ḥarag) with geometric (interlaces) and floral motifs, extending over one columns, two lateral extensions on the top reaching until the top of the page, one visible lateral extension on the lower left corner, reaching until l.2.
Pen-work divider between most days throughout the manuscript, consisting of combinations of black and red lines, dashes and dots.

item.desc: Cues for the rubricator consisting of two to three dots, often connected by a dash, and one dash at the right are used throughout manuscript in the margin left to the text to be added.
Scribbles in the left and top margin.
Crude drawings and scribbles in the right margin.
Crude drawings in the left and bottom margin.
Crude drawings in the right and bottom margin.
Crude drawing in the bottom margin.
Crude drawing in the bottom margin.
Scribbles and crude drawings in the bottom margin.
Scribbles and crude drawings in the bottom margin.
Four parallel dashes in the intercolumn space.
Connected parallel dashes in the intercolumn space.
Parchment repair in the bottom margin.
Parchment repair in the bottom margin.

መተረ፡ ርእሱ፡ ለቅዱስ፡ ለንጊኖስ፡ ወነሥአ፡ ርእሶ፡ ወወሰዳ፡ ምስሌሁ፡ ኢየሩሳሌም፡ ወመጠዎ፡ ለጲላጦስ፡ ጰንጤናዊ፨ ወጲላጦስ፡ መስፍን፡ አርአዮሙ፡ ለይእቲ፡ ርእስ፡ ለኵሎሙ፡ አይሁድ፡ ተፈሥሑ፡ ወተሐሠዩ፡ ቦቱ፨ ወአዘዘ፡ ጲላጦስ፡ ከመ፡ ይቅብርዋ፡ ለርእሰ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ለንጊኖስ፡ ውስተ፡ አሐቲ፡ ውግር፡ ዘአፍአ፡ ሀገረ፡ ኢየሩሳሌም፡ ወሖር፡ ወቀበርዋ፡ ህየ፨ ወእምድኅረ፡ ብዙኅ፡ መዋዕል፡ ኮነት፡ ብእሲቱ፡ እምሀገረ፡ ቀጳዶቅያ፡ አምነት፡ በእዴሁ፡ ለቅዱስ፡ ለንጊኖስ፡ ወሶበ፡ ሰበካ፡ በሀገረ፡ ቀጳዶቅያ፨ ወሶበ፡ መተሩ፡ ርእሶ፡ ሀለወት፡ ትቀውም፡ ህየ፡ ትኔጽር፡ ወትበኪ፡ ላዕሌሁ፨ ወፈቀደ፡ እግዚኣብሔር፡ ሎቱ፡ ስብሐት፡ አዖሩ፡ አዕይንቲሃ፡ ለይቲ፡ ብእሲት፡ ወነሥአት፡ ወልዳ፡ ወሖረት፡ ኢየሩሳሌም፡ ወከመ፡ ወትስግድ፡ ውስተ፡ መካናት፡ ወትትአማኅ፡ ወትትባረክ፡ ወትስአል፡ ኀበ፡ መቃብረ፡ እግዚእነ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ዮጊ፡ ከመ፡ ይትከሠት፡ አዕይንቲሃ፨ ወሶበ፡ በጽሐት፡ ኀበ፡ ኢየሩሳሌም፡ ወበይቲ፡ ጊዜ፡ በህየ፡ ሞተ፡ ወልዳ፨ ወተወሠከት፡ በእንተ፡ ሞተ፡ ወልዳ፡ ወበንተ፡ ዑረተ፡ አዕይንቲሃ፡ ወሐጥአት፡ ዘይመርሐ፡ ወተወሰከት፡ ሐዘነ፡ ወሐጥአት፡ ዘያበጽሐ፡ ኀበ፡ ብሔራ፨ ወበይእቲ፡ ጊዜ፡ በከየት፡ ብካየ፡ ዓቢየ፡ ወኖመት፡ እንዘ፡ ተኀዝን፡ ወርእየቶ፡ ለቅዱስ፡ ለንጊኖስ፡ በንዋም፡ ወምስሌሁ፡ ወልዳ፡ ዘሞተ፨ ወይቤላ፡ ሖሪ፡ ኀበ፡ መካነ፡ እገሌ፡ ወንሥኢ፡ ርእሰየ፡ እምህየ፨ ወሶበ፡ ነቅሐት፡ እምንዋማ፡ ተሳእለት፡ በእንተ፡ ውእቱ፡ መካን፡ ወአብጽሕዋ፡ ኀቤሁ፡ ሰብእ፨ ወሶበ፡ ርእየት፡ ውስተ፡ መካን፡ ዓርገ፡ እምኔሁ፡ ላቲ፡ ዕፍረት፡ ዘብዙኅ፡ ጼናሁ፡ ወምዑዝ፡ ፈድፋደ፨ ወሶበ፡ በጽሐት፡ ኀበ፡ ርእሱ፡ ለቅዱስ፡ ለንጊኖስ፡ ወተከሥተ፡ ክልእሆን፡ አዕይንቲሃ፡ ወሶቤሃ፡ ወርእየት፡ ሠናየ፨ ወሰብሐቶ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ ወርእየቶ፡ ለርቱዕ፡ ወአፍለሰት፡ ርእሰ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ለንጊኖስ፡ ወአንበረት፡ ዕፍረተ፡ ዲቤሃ፡ ወረሰየት፡ ምስለ፡ ሥጋሁ፡ ለወልዳ፡ ወሖረት፡ ኀበ፡ ብሔራ፡ እንዘ፡ ትሴብሖ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ ወትዌድሶ፡ ለቅዱስ፡ ለንጊኖስ፡ ጸሎቱ፡ ወበረከቱ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስሌነ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨
